title: Gold Ore
desc:
Post 791
- When stood on, you can convert drawn cards to <:yellow:1106234135384699023> + <:element:1107480918710571058>.
- You are not allowed to see the drawn card before you convert it.
- This card is of the Stone subtype.
- This card takes 3 hit to break with a tool that is not meant for it.
- This card cannot be drawn, and is instead created when a 788 is played before a <:yellow:1106234135384699023> card.
